name: The Cave (itch) (mateoalvarellos)
description:
You have entered the Cave looking for food and you have to hurry before the light turns off.

This game was made using the theme of the Ludum Dare 48 (Deeper and deeper) I could't participate.

CONTROLS:

   Use A or D to move and press SPACE to jump.

   Click 'Play' to start.
